column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I'm always impressed by the beautiful decor and hipster atmosphere. I never knew they served entrees
column2: so was pleasantly surprised to see a breakfast menu. We decided to go for the soft scramble
column3: an almond croissant and a fruit tart. Coffee for him
column4: Earl Grey for her. I gotta say
column5: I was so wonderfully and pleasantly surprised by how creamy and flavorful the eggs were
column6: paired with the perfectly crunchy baguette. The almond croissant did not disappoint
column7: and the tart was just okay (especially for $5.00). At the end of the meal I didn't feel really heavy or gross... just satisfied by a darn good meal.
